text: The JAC Refine M6 is a full-size Minivan made by JAC Motors since 2017. == History and Features == The Refine M6 was shown at the Shanghai Auto Show in 2013. but it started being sold only four years later in 2017 its the flagship model of the JAC Refine series positioned above the JAC Refine M3 JAC Refine M4 and the JAC Refine M5. since it is a premium MPV it has features find in luxury cars such as a digital TV on the vehicle's interior it has a controversial design since the design is very similar to the Toyota Alphard. It has a 2.0 liter turbo petrol engine with a 6-speed DCT transmission it was improved in 2017. it also has a long-wheelbase version based in the 2017 facelift model called Refine M6 MAX revealed at the Beijing Auto Show in October 2020. later in November it was renamed to L6 MAX. == Markets == The Refine M6 is currently mainly sold in The Chinese Market. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Vans Category:Minivans
title: JAC Refine M6
